com.jswiff.swfrecords
Class MorphLineStyle

java.lang.Object
  com.jswiff.swfrecords.MorphLineStyle
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class MorphLineStyle
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class is used to define line styles used in morph sequences. Line styles are defined in pairs: for start and for end shapes.

See Also:
MorphLineStyles, DefineMorphShape, Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
MorphLineStyle(int startWidth, RGBA startColor, int endWidth, RGBA endColor)
          Creates a new MorphLineStyle instance.
 
Method Summary
 RGBA getEndColor()
          Returns the color of lines used in the end shape of the morph sequence.
 int getEndWidth()
          Returns the width of lines used in the end shape of the morph sequence.
 RGBA getStartColor()
          Returns the color of lines used in the start shape of the morph sequence.
 int getStartWidth()
          Returns the width of lines used in the start shape of the morph sequence.

equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

MorphLineStyle

public MorphLineStyle(int startWidth,
                      RGBA startColor,
                      int endWidth,
                      RGBA endColor)
Creates a new MorphLineStyle instance. Supply width and RGBA color for lines in start and end shapes.

Parameters:
startWidth - width of line in start shape (in twips = 1/20 px)
startColor - color of line in start shape
endWidth - width of line in start shape (in twips = 1/20 px)
endColor - color of line in end shape
Method Detail

getEndColor

public RGBA getEndColor()
Returns the color of lines used in the end shape of the morph sequence.

Returns:
RGBA color of lines in end shape

getEndWidth

public int getEndWidth()
Returns the width of lines used in the end shape of the morph sequence.

Returns:
width of lines in end shape in twips (1/20 px)

getStartColor

public RGBA getStartColor()
Returns the color of lines used in the start shape of the morph sequence.

Returns:
RGBA color of lines in start shape

getStartWidth

public int getStartWidth()
Returns the width of lines used in the start shape of the morph sequence.

Returns:
width of lines in start shape in twips (1/20 px)
